#summary Shows the requirements for the project.
#labels Phase-Requirements

== Normal Requirements ==

  * Nearest Bus Stop
  * Your GPS location
  * Bus schedule information

== Excited Requirements ==

  * Give a bus route to the requested destination
  * Using bus stop information to calculate transfers
  * Tell what departure times you can make

== Thrilling Requirements ==

  * Give turn-by-turn directions to any destination
  * Most efficient route based on Dijkstra's Algorithm
  * Have local data survive palm restarts (RMS)
  * Allow user to save favorite locations
